description: fish +‎ plate. See fish (“curved wooden bar used to strengthen a ship's mast”).

entries.meaning: (rail transport) A metal bar that is bolted to the ends of two rails to join them together in a track.

verbs.description: fishplate (third-person singular simple present fishplates, present participle fishplating, simple past and past participle fishplated)

entries.meaning: (transitive, rail transport) To connect (rails) together using a fishplate.
